TableField.name: PolicyID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|An automatically assigned number used to track insurance policies

TableField.name: PolicyNumber
TableField.phrase: Policy Number|The policy number assigned by the insurance carrier

TableField.name: IntegrationKey
TableField.phrase: Integration Key|An alpha or alpha numeric value assigned by the claims administration company to enable to downloading of data directly from the claims administrator

TableField.name: OrganizationID
TableField.phrase: Organization|The primary organization covered by this insurance policy

ForeignField.name: Organization
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The primary organization covered by this insurance policy

TableField.name: RetentionAcct
TableField.phrase: Retention Account|Whether this policy is an internal retention or accruel account established to pay claims from internal funds

RemoteField.name: PersonAccountableID
RemoteField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for policy oversight relative to this specific policy

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for policy oversight relative to this specific policy

RemoteField.name: EffectiveDate
RemoteField.phrase: Effective Date|The date the insurance policy first becomes effective

RemoteField.name: ExpirationDate
RemoteField.phrase: Expiration Date|The date the is no longer in force and coverage no longer exists

CalculatedField.name: DaysRemaining
CalculatedField.phrase: Days Remaining|The total number of days remaining before the insurance policy expires

TableField.name: InsuranceTypeID
TableField.phrase: Insurance Type|A combined field used to describe this insurance type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: InsuranceCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Category|A broad categoy used to group equipments of similar types

CodeField.name: InsuranceCategory
CodeField.phrase: Category|A broad categoy used to group equipments of similar types

ForeignField.name: InsuranceTitleGuide
ForeignField.phrase: Insurance Type|A title or phrase used to describe a equipment type

ForeignField.name: InsuranceDescGuide
ForeignField.phrase: Description|A brief but thorough description of the equipment type
ForeignField.sample: Boiler and machinery insurance, sometimes referred to as 'equipment breakdown' or 'mechanical breakdown coverage,' provides coverage for the accidental breakdown of boilers, machinery, and equipment. This type of coverage usually will reimburse you for property damage and business interruption losses. For example, this coverage would cover fire damage to computers.

ForeignField.name: InsuranceType
ForeignField.phrase: Insurance Type|A combined field used to describe this insurance type when associating it with other records

TableField.name: PolicyName
TableField.phrase: Policy Name|A short name or phrase used to identify the insurancepolicy

TableField.name: PolicyDesc
TableField.phrase: Policy Description|A detailed description of the insrance policy in effect and any special endorsements or exclusions associated with the policy
TableField.sample: This is the general liability policy for the packing operation. All physical locations are included in this coverage.

TableField.name: PolicyStatusID
TableField.phrase: Policy Status|The status of this insurance policy

CodeField.name: PolicyStatus
CodeField.phrase: Policy Status|The status of this insurance policy

TableField.name: CarrierNameID
TableField.phrase: Carrier Name|The name of insurance carrier providing the policy and related coverages

ForeignField.name: CarrierName
ForeignField.phrase: Carrier Name|The name of insurance carrier providing the policy and related coverages

RemoteField.name: CarrierContactID
RemoteField.phrase: Primary Contact Person|The person acting as the primary contact between the carrier and the primary organization of the policy holder

ForeignField.name: CarrierContact
ForeignField.phrase: Primary Contact Person|The person acting as the primary contact between the carrier and the primary organization of the policy holder

TableField.name: EstimatedPremium
TableField.phrase: Estimated Premium|The total estimated cost of this insurance premium, stated in the currency assigned to this installation of the software

TableField.name: PremiumPaid
TableField.phrase: Paid Premium|The amount actually paid to satisfy the estimated premium, stated in the currency assigned to this installation of the software

CalculatedField.name: OutstandingPremium
CalculatedField.phrase: Outstanding Premium|The amount left to be paid to satisfy the estimated premium, stated in the currency assigned to this installation of the software. The outstanding reserve is the difference between Total Incurred and the Paid to Date amounts

TableField.name: PremiumValuationDate
TableField.phrase: Premium Valuation Date|The specific date the premium payment evaluation occurred

TableField.name: BrokerNameID
TableField.phrase: Broker Name|The name of the insurance brokerage firm responsible for selling and supporting the insurance policy

ForeignField.name: BrokerName
ForeignField.phrase: Broker Name|The name of the insurance brokerage firm responsible for selling and supporting the insurance policy

RemoteField.name: BrokerContactID
RemoteField.phrase: Broker Contact|The name of the individual working for the insurance broker that has been assigned responsibility for organization's insurance program

ForeignField.name: BrokerContact
ForeignField.phrase: Broker Contact|The name of the individual working for the insurance broker that has been assigned responsibility for organization's insurance program

TableField.name: BrokerageFee
TableField.phrase: Brokerage Fee|The total fee paid to the insurance broker to secure this policy and service this account, stated in the currency assigned to this installation of the software

TableField.name: PercentofPremium
TableField.phrase: Brokerage Percentage|An automatic calculation of the fee paid to the insurance broker as a percentage of premium

TableField.name: ExcessCarrierID
TableField.phrase: Excess Carrier|The name of the reinsurance company or excess carrier that begins participating in coverage when a threshold amount has been exceeded

ForeignField.name: ExcessCarrier
ForeignField.phrase: Excess Carrier|The name of the reinsurance company or excess carrier that begins participating in coverage when a threshold amount has been exceeded

SummaryField.name: RiskImperatives
SummaryField.phrase: Risk Imperatives|A list of associated Risk Imperatives

SummaryField.name: TotalEstExp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Exposure|The total estimated cost exposure associated with the insurance policy

SummaryField.name: TotalEstOpp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Opportunity|The total estimated financial opportunity associated with the insurance policy

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes
CombinedField.sample: General Libility Number: CNA-2714-2006 issued by CNA Insurance Company, expiring on 01-01-2006

CombinedField.name: Policy
CombinedField.phrase: Policy|A combined field used to describe this policy when associating it with other records

CodeCheckSearchField.name: RiskImperativeID
CodeCheckSearchField.phrase: Risk Imperatives|Filter search results by one or more related risk imperatives

ViewScreen.phrase: View|View summary information about an insurance policy

EditScreen.phrase: Form|Edit summary information about an insurance policy

EditScreen.phrase: Broker|Associate an insurance broker with an insurance policy

EditScreen.phrase: Insureds|Associate covered organizations with the insurance policy

EditScreen.phrase: Limits|Associate coverage and threshold limits with the insurance policy

EditScreen.phrase: Coordinators|Associate local policy coordinators with the insurance policy

EditScreen.name: AssetProtection
EditScreen.phrase: Audits|Associate audit items with the insurance policy

EditScreen.name: Culture
EditScreen.phrase: Culture|Associate values with the insurance policy

EditScreen.name: CostExposures
EditScreen.phrase: Exposures|Associate cost exposures with the insurance policy

EditScreen.name: Opportunities
EditScreen.phrase: Opportunities|Associate financial opportunities with the insurance policy

EditScreen.name: Hazards
EditScreen.phrase: Hazards|Associate hazards with the insurance policy

EditScreen.name: Regulations
EditScreen.phrase: Regulations|Associate regulations with the insurance policy

EditScreen.name: Standards
EditScreen.phrase: Standards|Associate standards with the insurance policy

EditScreen.name: BusinessConsequences
EditScreen.phrase: Consequences|Associate business consequences with the insurance policy

EditScreen.name: Accountability
EditScreen.phrase: Accountability|Associate participants with ongoing accountabilities with the insurance policy

EditScreen.name: Involvement
EditScreen.phrase: Involvement|Associate participants involved with the insurance policy

EditScreen.name: FileRetention
EditScreen.phrase: File Retention|Associate file retention methods with the insurance policy

EditScreen.name: Imperatives
EditScreen.phrase: Imperatives|Associate risk imperatives with the insurance policy

EditScreen.name: BestPractices
EditScreen.phrase: Best Practices|Associate best practices with the insurance policy

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: People Elements
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific information regarding the way this module impacts people should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about how this module impacts, or is impacted by, people in general. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
